title: Neonatal Care Services & Treatment | Children's Minnesota
description: Looking for neonatal care services or treatment? Discover Children's Minnesota. Our services include neonatal care, NICU services & neonatology services.
cleaned_text: Conditions and services The neonatology program at Children's Minnesota has the advanced treatment your baby needs, whether they were diagnosed with a condition while in the womb or they need special care after birth. Our neonatal intensive care units are fully equipped to treat the littlest babies with the most critical needs. Here is a small sampling of what we're experts at treating Brain and central nervous system (acquired during pregnancy, birth or early newborn period) Group B Streptococcus, Listeriosis, [Sepsis](/educationmaterials/childrensmn/article/15367/sepsis/) Other Cardiac, Genetics, Hematologic, Kidney, [Neonatal Abstinence Syndrome, ](/services/care-specialties-departments/neonatal-program/conditions-and-services/neonatal-abstinence-syndrome/) Skeletal
